body.p: Bowling Green, Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Charlotte County, Virginia native. Married Hetta Jackson Hines in Warren County in May 1817. Married Regina Collins Hines in Warren County in December 1827. Married Sally Gatton Hines in Warren County in October 1832. Married to Tabitha A. Hines. Father of Martha Hines, Hetty Hines, Sarah J. Hines, John Hines and William H. Hines. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Owned fourteen persons in Warren County in 1850. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1857 to 1859. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Owned thirty-three enslaved persons in Warren County in 1860.
